cz.ive.simulation
Interface SchedulingStatistics

All Superinterfaces:
Hook
All Known Implementing Classes:
SchedulingStatisticsImpl
public interface SchedulingStatistics
extends Hook

Interface for controlling scheduling statistics. For a usage of the statistics for cleaning, the Hook interface is provided

Author:
pavel

Method Summary

          Checks whether the load-based cleanup is enabled.

          Clears the time penalty, when we are no longer going to hurry because of the previous slowness.

Method Detail

resetStatistics

void resetStatistics(int threshold,
                     int windowLen,
                     int minLoops,
                     long loopTime)
Reset the statistics parameters and clears the state

Parameters:
threshold - Percentage of bussiness to start cleaning
windowLen - Number of scheduling loops to consider. Longer windowLen means slower reaction, but better stability in local boosts
minLoops - Minimum loops between two cleanings if the threshold is permanently overshooted
loopTime - Time of one scheduling loop

resetStatistics

void resetStatistics(int threshold,
                     int windowLen,
                     int minLoops)
Reset the statistics parameters and clears the state

Parameters:
threshold - Percentage of bussiness to start cleaning
windowLen - Number of scheduling loops to consider. Longer windowLen means slower reaction, but better stability in local boosts
minLoops - Minimum loops between two cleanings if the threshold is permanently overshooted

setLoopTime

void setLoopTime(long loopTime)
setter for the loopTime parameter. This method clears the statistics state

clearStatistics

void clearStatistics()
clear all measured statistics

startStatistics

void startStatistics()
start statistics measuring if they are not running yet

stopStatistics

void stopStatistics()
stop statistics measuring

clearPenalty

void clearPenalty()
Clears the time penalty, when we are no longer going to hurry because of the previous slowness.

isRunning

boolean isRunning()
Checks whether the statistics are measured.

Returns:
true iff the statistics are measured and used.

getCurrentLoad

int getCurrentLoad()
gets current business percentage

shift

void shift(long time)
Shifts the window and recomputes and apply all statistics

Parameters:
time - Time spent by computing in this iteration

getThreshold

int getThreshold()
Getter for the current treshnold for cleaning.

Returns:
percentage of bussiness to start cleaning

getWindowLen

int getWindowLen()
Getter for the current window lenght

Returns:
Number of scheduling loops considered

getMinLoops

int getMinLoops()
Getter for the current minimal number of loops between cleanups.

Returns:
minimum loops between two cleanings

enableCleanup

void enableCleanup(boolean enable)
Enables or disables load-based cleanup.

Parameters:
enable - The requested mode

cleanupEnabled

boolean cleanupEnabled()
Checks whether the load-based cleanup is enabled.

Returns:
true iff the cleanup is enabled
